SELECT A.B_SEQ ,A.BBS_SEQ ,A.B_TITLE ,fn_ct_get_code_name('weather', A.WEATHER ) AS WEATHER_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('autocar_driving_mode', A.DRIVING_MODE ) as DRIVING_MODE_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('road_situation', A.ROAD_SITUATION ) AS ROAD_SITUATION_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('road_type_cd', A.ROAD_TYPE_CD ) AS ROAD_TYPE_CD_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_VIEW ,B.SAVE_NM ,TO_CHAR(ROUND(NVL(B.FILE_SIZE,0)/1024/1024,0),'999,999,999,999,999') || ' MB' AS FILE_SIZE_VIEW ,C.EVAL_ID ,C.EVAL_POINT ,TO_CHAR(C.EVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS EVAL_DATE_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(C.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DREG_DATE_VIEW FROM TB_WEB_HT_BOARD A, TB_WEB_HT_APPEND B, TB_WEB_HT_DOWNLOAD C WHERE 1=1 AND A.B_SEQ = B.B_SEQ AND A.B_SEQ = C.B_SEQ
A.B_SEQ = #sBSeq#
A.B_TITLE LIKE '%'||#sTitle#||'%'
C.EVAL_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE( #stdate# || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE( #eddate# || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY C.REG_DATE DESC

SELECT A.B_SEQ ,A.BBS_SEQ ,A.B_TITLE ,fn_ct_get_code_name('weather', A.WEATHER ) AS WEATHER_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('autocar_driving_mode', A.DRIVING_MODE ) as DRIVING_MODE_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('road_situation', A.ROAD_SITUATION ) AS ROAD_SITUATION_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('road_type_cd', A.ROAD_TYPE_CD ) AS ROAD_TYPE_CD_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_VIEW ,B.SAVE_NM ,TO_CHAR(ROUND(NVL(B.FILE_SIZE,0)/1024/1024,0),'999,999,999,999,999') || ' MB' AS FILE_SIZE_VIEW ,C.EVAL_ID ,C.EVAL_POINT ,TO_CHAR(C.EVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS EVAL_DATE_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(C.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS DREG_DATE_VIEW FROM TB_WEB_HT_BOARD A, TB_WEB_HT_APPEND B, TB_WEB_HT_DOWNLOAD C WHERE 1=1 AND A.B_SEQ = B.B_SEQ AND A.B_SEQ = C.B_SEQ
A.B_SEQ = #sBSeq#
A.B_TITLE LIKE '%'||#sTitle#||'%'

ORDER BY C.REG_DATE DESC
